name: 2021 10th International Conference on Pure and Applied Mathematics
content: Publication: Submitted papers will be peer-reviewed by the technical program committees. All accepted papers will be published into ICPAM 2021 IOP CPS Conference Proceedings, which will be indexed by EI Compendex, Scopus, etc. Selected papers will be published into International Journal of Applied Physics and Mathematics (IJAPM), ISSN: 2010-362X, which is indexed by Copernicus, EI (INSPEC, IET), Chemical Abstracts Services (CAS), Electronic Journals Library, Nanowerk Database, Google Scholar and ProQuest etc.
